snippet.title: JumpStart Toddlers (1996)
snippet.description:
Completely redone gameplay, righting many of the wrongs from the old video. I am using a newer disc (v1.6) of the classic version that runs on Windows XP, unlike the old video in which that version used the original release disc, meant for Windows 3.1 and Windows 95. Despite doing better gameplay and covering more here, sound clips seem to abruptly end most of the time, I apologize for this!

JumpStart Toddlers is a game released by Knowledge Adventure in 1996 that focuses on educational concepts for toddlers. It would later be replaced by JumpStart Toddlers (2000). It is also known as Jump Ahead Toddlers in Europe.

The player's guide and mascot for the game is Giggles the gopher. In the game, the player can click on different items in a playroom and play seven different activities. During an activity, the player can use the Button Bar at the bottom of the screen to access the other activities or return to the playroom.
